title: Madras Star Turns RJ in Her Next
text:
Email 0 
Riythvika, who shot to fame with her performance in Madras, will next be seen in the film Oru Naal Koothu, which has been directed by Nelson. It features Attakathi Dinesh, Mia George, and Nivedha in the lead. The actor says she plays a radio jockey in the film. “Unlike what it appears to be, the job of a radio jockey is extremely difficult and challenging. I realised this as I spent time with other RJs in a private firm while they were at work. The director wanted me to observe them for at least 10 days. 
If I have played my role with conviction, it is because of what I learnt there,” she says. Riythvika says that initially she was not interested in this project but the director was very particular. “Once I listened to the script, I immediately agreed. If I had not, I would have missed a wonderful opportunity,” she adds.
